description: This is despite gross domestic product growing significantly under President Tsai Ing-wen’s leadership. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: High inflation, stagnant wages could impact Taiwan’s Jan 13 elections
title_page: High inflation, stagnant wages could impact Taiwan’s Jan 13 elections | The Straits Times
maintext:
TAIPEI – Bubble tea used to be a weekly indulgence for Taiwanese digital marketing specialist Wang Chia-chen.
But about four months ago, she decided to limit the treat to just one cup a month – and it had nothing to do with health concerns.
